import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import useInput from "../hooks/useInput"; import axios from "axios"; const Register = () => { const userName = useInput(); const email = useInput(); const password = useInput(); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); axios .post("http://localhost:3001/api/register", { userName: userName.value, email: email.value, password: password.value }) .then((res) => { console.log("JSX -> ",res.data) }) }; return (
